Package com.flowpowered.caustic.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GLVersioned
    Represents an object that has an OpenGL version associated to it.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Represents a rendering action that can be executed with Action.execute(com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl.Context).
    Action.BindFrameBufferAction
    An action that binds a frame buffer to the context.
    Action.ClearBufferAction
    An action that clear the buffer currently bound to the context.
    Action.DisableCapabilitiesAction
    An action that disables capabilities in the context.
    Action.EnableCapabilitiesAction
    An action that enables capabilities in the context.
    Action.RenderModelsAction
    An action that renders the models to the bound buffer.
    Action.SetBlendingFunctions
    An action that set the blending functions.
    Action.SetCameraAction
    An action that sets the camera in the context.
    Action.SetClearColorAction
    An action that sets the color for clearing color buffers in the context.
    Action.SetDepthMaskAction
    An action that enables the depth mask.
    Action.SetViewPortAction
    An action that sets the view port in the context.
    Action.UnbindFrameBufferAction
    An action that unbinds a frame buffer from the context.
    Action.UpdateDisplayAction
    An action that updates the context's display.
    Camera
    Represents a camera with a projection, position and rotation, for rendering purposes.
    Creatable
    Represents a resource that can be created and destroyed.
    GLImplementation
    Represents and implementation of an OpenGL or OpenGLES version.
    Material
    Represents an OpenGL material.
    Pipeline
    Represents a rendering pipeline.
    Pipeline.PipelineBuilder
    Used to built a pipeline through chained calls.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GLVersioned.GLVersion
    An enum of the existing OpenGL versions.
